programme.title: Last Train To Christmas
programme.desc: Tony Towers is a local celebrity, a successful nightclub manager and he is engaged to a younger woman, Sue. Things get a little strange when he embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion.

programme.title: Films & Stars - EP 886

programme.title: The Wall UK S4 - EP 4
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Don't Forget the Lyrics USA S6 - EP 3
programme.desc: The hit music game show is back! Just like in the original version, one contestant must attempt to sing through and fill in the missing lyrics to TEN of the biggest hit songs of all time! But when the music stops, the contestant must correctly provide the missing song lyrics. If a contestant can successfully make it through the first 9 songs without missing a SINGLE lyric, they'll have the chance to play a 10th and final song for a shot at ONE MILLION DOLLARS!

programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough journeys into the hidden world of forests, where lives are entwined in the most unexpected of ways. programme.title: Together - EP 35
programme.desc: Jian Hong is diagnosed with a brain tumor and requires surgery. Xiao Bei's return is a joyous occasion for his parents, who have not seen him in 10 years. Ah Jiao is worried that Xiao Bei will steal Jian Hong away from Tarzan but Tarzan is too worried about Jian Hong's surgery to care.

programme.title: Together - EP 36
programme.desc: Jian Hong loses her memory after her surgery and can only remember things from the past. She does not remember being married to Tarzan or having Yi Xin. Tarzan decides to leave Jian Hong before she regains her memory. He tells Xiao Bei to take good care of her. Jian Hong sees the ring that Xiao Bei gave her and her memory starts to return.

programme.title: An Ode To Life - EP 17
programme.desc: Ah Zhi is a hapless and simple girl who's in love with an artist Qiming. Deceived by her mother, she is forced to marry into a rich family and is shocked to find out that her husband Wenshou suffers from autism. Not only does Ah Zhi has to take care of her husband, she also has to contend with the scheming machinations of her husband's siblings, as they seek to discredit her; and the distrust of her mother-in-law who believes she brings ill luck to the family.

programme.desc: Alan tried ways and means to get Ai Hua to help him look after Nicole but to no avail. Alan decided to dump Nicole outside her shop as a last resort. programme.desc: Bound for over 200 years, and in a quest for indomitable power, an evil entity that Anamika releases by ill fate threatens her lover Nanda's life and her boss Rishi's unrequited love for her. Setting off an age-old battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Malar
programme.desc: Though not siblings by birth, Parvathi means the world to her warm-hearted sister Malar. While Malar's ultimate wish is to find the perfect life partner & a happily-ever-after life for Paravathi, what is destiny's plan for them?

programme.title: Sevvanthi
programme.desc: Destiny plays a cruel role in Sevanthi's naive and sheltered life with her dream-come-true husband Mano and his extended family. Watch Sevanthi traverse the nuances of family, despite the challenges life throws at her.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: Punnagai Poove
programme.desc: Ever since destiny united Kalaivani with Chezhiyan during childhood, she has been thinking of him as her prince charming. Will her hopes of a fairy tale life prevail against the odds and hurdles she is about to encounter?

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.title: ilakkiya
programme.desc: Bold and beautiful Ilakkiya finds happiness in making others happy. Circumstance leads to her tying the knot with her friend Gautham. Can Ilakkiya create her destiny, despite Gautham's controlling aunt Bairavi & her conniving cousin Anjali?

programme.title: LAKSHMI
programme.desc: Maha, her familys financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the familys peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: ANANDA RAGAM
programme.desc: Unfortunate events force an ambitious Eashwari and a school dropout Azhagar to tie the knot. Can this odd couple turn their marriage into a happily ever after? Will Eashwari realize her IPS dream amidst life's many hardships?

programme.title: Movie - THALIKATHA KALIAMMAN
programme.desc: Bose, a young man, marries Karpagam after rescuing her from the wrath of villagers. However, the spirit of his previous wife enters her body as she desires to live with him.

programme.title: Movie Contd - THALIKATHA KALIAMMAN

programme.title: RAMAYANAM
programme.desc: When Sita, the wife of Prince Rama of Ayodhya, is abducted by Ravana, the Asura king of Lanka, Rama sets out to liberate her with the help of various allies.

programme.title: Annam
programme.desc: Exuding warmth & courage, self-reliant Annam, living with an estranged father and a cruel stepmother, longs for a loving bond to escape her home. Will she find the love she seeks?

programme.title: Kayal
programme.desc: Abandoned by her father and coping with an alcoholic brother, Kayal works as a nurse to be her family's sole provider. She finds happiness in her sacrifice to meet the needs of her brother and sisters. Watch Kayal stand tall in her selfless journey.

programme.title: Marumagal
programme.desc: Aathirai's unyielding passion for helping others constantly lands her in trouble, while Prabhu's self-serving actions show disregard for his own family's well-being. Follow their tumultuous journeys as fate brings them together in marriage.

programme.title: Moondru Mudichu
programme.desc: Nandini is a self-assured girl who puts her familys happiness above hers. On the other hand Surya hates his mother due to lingering resentments and deliberately bonds with Nandini to cause strife. Watch what destiny has in store for Nandini & Surya.

programme.title: Singapenne
programme.desc: Born into a humble & rustic background troubled by familial & financial concerns, Anandhi takes it upon herself to leave home & fearlessly pursue a better life for her family. Watch her bravely face the odds of life with unwavering spirit.

programme.title: News

programme.title: Ranjani
programme.desc: Raised in a strict home, Ranjani found happiness solely in the company of four boys from her neighbourhood. As she grew up, their friendship meant the world to her. Can she find love while upholding their close bonds amidst family and social constraints?

programme.title: Malli
programme.desc: Things take a momentous shift when a bold & loving village girl, Malli, crosses paths with a doting father and his 6-year-old daughter who yearns for a mother's love. Join the family's journey through the nuances of love, affection & parenthood.

programme.title: Terrible Jungle
programme.desc: Eliott, a naive young researcher, heads off to study a mysterious tribe in Amazonia: the Otopis. An opportunity for him to escape his stiflingly possessive mother, Chantal de Bellabre! But worried about her son, she decides to go in search of him, deep in the jungle...

programme.title: L'attente
programme.desc: Jeanne and Celine are at the maternity clinic for the arrival of their first child. It's Jeanne who is going to give birth. During the night, in the hospital entrance hall, Celine meets two men who, like her... are waiting.

programme.title: #Investigation
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 6
programme.desc: The Hotel de la Marine, Paris, covers two hundred and fifty years of naval history. Multi-talented artist, Aurelie Galois paints industrial canvases in rubber, just like little secret boxes. Designer Peter Do: for the love of material and the perfect cut. Agnes Kappler makes tarot cards the old-fashioned way.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 12
programme.desc: Latin America is a political construction which developed in the 19th century. From Mexico to Argentina: the 20 countries forming Latin America are very diverse. What do huge Brazil and Mexico have in common with tiny Salvador? What is its diplomatic line on the world stage?

programme.title: Sur Le Front - EP 28
programme.desc: In a country proud of its 365 cheeses, an investigation into the hidden side of intensive dairy production. Originally almost every variety was linked to a specific breed of cow. Today the traditional breeds are increasingly replaced by those which are the most productive, making a less authentic cheese.

programme.title: Les Travaux Et Les Jours
programme.desc: Young and connected, the Cistercian nuns of the Sainte-Marie de Boulaur Abbey, in the Occitanie region, live through their faith and from their agricultural production. In order to remain independent, they have launched the building of a modern, environmentally-friendly barn, a construction project they will be supervising themselves.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 19
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 2
programme.desc: An immersive trip aboard the Breton trawler ''Le Magellan''. Ten days to the rhythm of a net that needs to be raised every 4 hours, followed by sorting, gutting and storing the fish in the hold. Ten days alongside this chain gang of the seas and their worries.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 5
programme.desc: Efforts to protect our forests are being made on several different fronts. Creating protected spaces is a particularly reliable way to protect them.

programme.title: Le Proces D'emma Bovary
programme.desc: Judged scandalous until her final breath, Emma Bovary, Flaubert's heroine, earned him a trial in a Paris magistrates' court, in 1857, for ''outrage to public morality''. Her character was studied in every detail, but the writer's intentions remain secret, served by a completely new literary style.

programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 36
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 35
programme.desc: Upon his return, Leo announces that he's been ''immunised'' against mutation! To celebrate, Marcus organises a treasure hunt. Meanwhile, Dahlia and Bertrand try to find Julianne, who has given herself up to Agrotek...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Robert Le Vigan, La Cavale D'un Maudit
programme.desc: From ''Quai des Brumes'' to ''Goupi Mains Rouges'', Robert Le Vigan (1900-1972) is one of the emblematic supporting actors of French cinema. programme.desc: Reunion Island owes its existence to volcanic activity. After surging from the ocean depths, the island still suffers from the frequent eruptions of the Piton de la Fournaise. programme.title: Sa Majeste Le Cerf
programme.desc: As graceful as they are strong, yet always discrete, stags employ impressive survival strategies and maintain extraordinary social connections. Deep in the heart of France, an immersive exploration of a stag's life, from his birth to the end of his days, alongside his mother and then with the herd.

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 3
programme.desc: Christian inaugurates his studio in the Eastern Townships with, amongst others, the actress Anick Lemay, and makes the most of the moment to meet those with a passion for the region and delighted to share their favourite local products.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Le Grand Move - EP 5
programme.desc: Marie-Lou, recently separated, and her two teenagers have left Longueuil to live a new life together in La Tuque.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 4
programme.desc: Reunion Island owes its existence to volcanic activity. After surging from the ocean depths, the island still suffers from the frequent eruptions of the Piton de la Fournaise. One of the world's most active volcanoes, its lava ignites the lunar landscape and turns the sky a multitude of surrealist colours...

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 40
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 41
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 22
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 37
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 36
programme.desc: Julianne is still missing, Lila decides to kidnap Guy and force him to reveal where she's being held. Tom and Leo are torn beyond between their bond with the mutants and the hope of seeing their own mother again.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 3
programme.desc: Christian inaugurates his studio in the Eastern Townships with, amongst others, the actress Anick Lemay, and makes the most of the moment to meet those with a passion for the region and delighted to share their favourite local products.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Littoral - EP 2
programme.desc: An immersive trip aboard the Breton trawler ''Le Magellan''. Ten days to the rhythm of a net that needs to be raised every 4 hours, followed by sorting, gutting and storing the fish in the hold. Ten days alongside this chain gang of the seas and their worries.

programme.title: Le Point
programme.desc: Through its reporters spread across the whole of Canada and the four corners of the world, the magazine ''Le Point'' gives a true testimony of what is happening in the major areas of Canada, Europe, Asia, Africa, the USA and Latin America.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: La Grande Magie
programme.desc: The 1920s, an unhappy young woman staying with her jealous husband in a seaside hotel makes the most of a magic show to disappear. Demanding his wife's return, the husband is given a box he must only open if he has absolute faith in her. Charles begins to have doubts...

programme.title: Je Suis Malika
programme.desc: Malika is a surprising woman. As demonstrated by this short programme, inspired by one of her many stories.

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: Sortez-Moi De Moi - EP 1
programme.desc: In a manic psychosis, David is taken to the emergency department by a colleague where he is seen by Justine. Clara and Myriam are called out on a home visit where the situation rapidly degenerates.

programme.title: Sortez-Moi De Moi - EP 2
programme.desc: Justine and emile are going through a difficult period. Louie confronts David about his misconduct. Gabriel is given some upsetting news, following a call to intervene in a domestic dispute.

programme.title: Movie - Naaigal Jaakirathai
programme.desc: Karthick Chinnamalai, a cop, takes the help of a trained military dog for his assistance in finding out the whereabouts of his wife Renuka, who has been kidnapped.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Naal Iravil
programme.desc: After misjudging his daughter's friendship, Sekar, an NRI, gets drunk and ends up in a locked-up building with a sex worker. What follows is a series of events that make him realise his mistakes.

programme.title: Movie - Sabash Babu
programme.desc: Lalitha becomes extremely disturbed after she loses her newborn child. However, when she meets Babu, an orphan, she finds another reason to live.

programme.title: Movie - Enga Annan Varattum
programme.desc: Enga Annan Varattum is a 1990 Indian Tamil film directed by R.Krishna Moorthy. It is produced by Mohan Natarajan and Tharangai V. Shanmugam.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Vasantha Ragam
programme.desc: Vasantha Raagam is a romantic drama film directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar. The cast includes Vijayakanth, Rahman, Sudha Chandran and S. A. Chandrasekhar. S. A. Chandrasekhar's son Vijay plays a child artist in this film.

programme.title: Movie - Kaathaludan
programme.desc: A talented magician pursues to know more about the girl he is arranged to marry. He begins to admire her and help her family with their debts. Soon, he learns that she is in love with another man, and helps them to get married.

programme.title: Movie - Seethanam
programme.desc: After being released from jail, Muthu Manikkam takes on the illegal activities of a corrupt politician to settle old scores. But he faces trouble through a lawyer who does not approve of his deeds.

programme.title: Movie - Kungumapottu Gounder
programme.desc: Kandasamy is desperate to enroll his son in a good school. Problems arise when his wife spots him with an educated woman who is posing as their child's mother in order to help the kid gain admission.

programme.title: Movie - Samasthanam
programme.desc: Thiru and Surya are friends whose relationship has survived many hurdles. But their bond is broken when a rift is caused due to their respective wives.

programme.title: Movie - Sathurangam
programme.desc: Journalist Thirupati blows the lid from the sad conditions prevailing inside prisons. A corrupt jailer and a minister are sacked as a result. Shortly, his girlfriend is kidnapped by an unknown person.

programme.title: Movie - Enga Ooru Sippayi
programme.desc: Rasaiyya, an army man, grows up thinking that his father and sister died in an accident. However, when he learns that they both were tortured and killed by a rich landlord, he decides to seek revenge.

programme.title: Movie - Pillaiyar Theru Kadasi Veedu
programme.desc: Ganesan loves Sandhya, but fatefully his marriage is arranged with Valli, his uncle's daughter. When he learns that Sandhya is terminally ill, he marries her and earns the wrath of his family.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Find out all about the top goods and services as shown on television, with consumers being able to place orders for these products.

programme.title: Movie - Sindhunathi Poo
programme.desc: When Valli learns of her husband Chettiar's affair with her sister, she commits suicide. Thirukkaval, her son, vows to take revenge on Chettiar.

programme.title: Movie - Thaaye Neeye Thunai
programme.desc: When Seeta suddenly loses her vision on the night of her marriage, she decides to hide the truth from her husband. Trouble ensues when her husband learns about her condition.

programme.title: Movie - Enna Petha Rasa
programme.desc: Lakshmi and Raja fall in love and decide to get married. But on the day of the marriage, Raja is accused of murdering a woman.

programme.title: Movie - Kummi Pattu
programme.desc: A son assumes that his father killed his mother and in a fit of rage, he also rapes the woman who was to marry his step-brother. However, the woman decides to help him overcome his misgivings.

programme.title: Movie - Mappillai (Old)
programme.desc: Rajeshwari agrees to get her daughter Gayathri married to her beau Saravanan, thinking him to be subservient. But her plans are foiled when she realises that he has a violent past.

programme.title: ASO Sailing Programming 2024
programme.desc: The Vende Globe is a single-handed, non-stop, non-assisted round-the-world sailing race that takes place every 4 years. The skippers set off from Les Sables-d'Olonne in Vende and sail around 45,000 kilometres around the globe, rounding the three legendary capes (Good Hope, Leeuwin and finally Cape Horn) before returning to Les Sables d'Olonne. The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Andrew Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha
programme.desc: This episode features main event Andrew 'One Gear' Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha for the heavyweight title. From EFC71 in Carnival City, Johannesburg, South Africa on 23-June-2018.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Derrell Coley vs. Kip Diggs / Fernando Vargas vs. Jose Morales
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another excitingGreatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. In a fight for the vacant NABF Welterweight Championship, evenly matched Derrell Coley (29-1-2) and Kip Diggs (27-2) square off in what would be a classic back-and-forth battle, with multiple knockdowns and a fight to close to call on the judges' scorecards.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Ricky Hatton vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of fighters who have just one loss to their record, as Ricky Hatton battles Paulie Malignaggi in a light welterweight championship bout that was billed as "Power vs. Precision." Also on the card, future heavyweight champion Tyson Fury battles with Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Hakuho, Goeido, Kakuryu and Takayasu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The next season opens with a qualifying round in Venice Beach, California. More than half of the obstacles used on this season were never seen before, and this premiere features exciting new challenges such as the Frame Slider, Domino Hill, Chain Swing and Flying Nun Chucks. Returning fan favorites in Venice Beach include parkour enthusiasts Kyle Cochran and Brent Steffensen.

Show 5 featuring Hakuho, Goeido, Kakuryu and Takayasu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The next season opens with a qualifying round in Venice Beach, California. More than half of the obstacles used on this season were never seen before, and this premiere features exciting new challenges such as the Frame Slider, Domino Hill, Chain Swing and Flying Nun Chucks. Returning fan favorites in Venice Beach include parkour enthusiasts Kyle Cochran and Brent Steffensen.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Andrew Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha
programme.desc: This episode features main event Andrew 'One Gear' Van Zyl vs. Champion Dalcha for the heavyweight title. From EFC71 in Carnival City, Johannesburg, South Africa on 23-June-2018.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Derrell Coley vs. Kip Diggs / Fernando Vargas vs. Jose Morales
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another excitingGreatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. In a fight for the vacant NABF Welterweight Championship, evenly matched Derrell Coley (29-1-2) and Kip Diggs (27-2) square off in what would be a classic back-and-forth battle, with multiple knockdowns and a fight to close to call on the judges' scorecards.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Ricky Hatton vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of fighters who have just one loss to their record, as Ricky Hatton battles Paulie Malignaggi in a light welterweight championship bout that was billed as "Power vs. Precision." Also on the card, future heavyweight champion Tyson Fury battles with Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo

programme.title: MEGA Fights Andre Ward vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features light heavyweights Andre 'S.O.G.' Ward (25-0, 13 KOs) vs. Chad Dawson (31-1, 17 KOs) in a championship contest from the Oracle Arena in Oakland, California, USA, on September 8, 2012. A paid attendance of 7,611 brought in a gate of $706,469 and 1.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Tayfun Ozcan vs Andy Souwer
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Eindhoven, the Netherlands, features Tayfun Ozcan (Turkey) looking to ascend the kickboxing ranks as he faces legend Andy Souwer (the Netherlands).

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Martin Rodriguez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Adrien Broner taking on Martin Rodriguez to determine the new WBO super featherweight world champion. With both fighters looking for their first major world championship, one left hook will bring about a new champion. Also on the card, action from multi-weight champion Paul Williams and Verno Phillips.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Endo, Abi, Meisei and Chiyonokuni from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Luis Maysonet
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector "Macho" Camacho (48-3 22 KO 150 lbs) looks to continue his winning streak against Luis Maysonet (28-5 28 KO) in a 10-round contest from Foxwoods Resort Mashantucket CT USA.

programme.title: FS MMA Mariusz Pudzianowski vs. Pawel Mikolajuw
programme.desc: This episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA showcases action from KSW 37 in Krakow Poland, highlighted by a Heavyweight showdown between hard-punching Mariusz Puszianowski taking on the 'Popek Monster' Pawel Mikolajuw. Both fighters weigh in at over 250 lbs. and can end the fight at any moment. It's Pudzianowski vs. Mikolajuw, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.desc: It's a hot day and Duggee's flowers are looking sad. Some water would perk them up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 24
programme.desc: Norrie is upset when she sees a leaf fall from the tree, because she thinks it's broken.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 25
programme.desc: Duggee is blowing up balloons for Tino the grumpy artistic mouse's birthday.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels play hide and seek. Duggee counts while the Squirrels hide.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels decide to play Hide and Seek.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing when they notice that there is a sheep in the clubhouse!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 29
programme.desc: The squirrels are playing when Norrie discovers a spider in the dressing up box.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: Duggee is stroking Enid the cat, and the squirrels want to find animals to stroke as well.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a snowman.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 32
programme.desc: Duggee is painting the clubhouse, and the squirrels ask if they can help out.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 33
programme.desc: It's time for a Spring Clean. Duggee is dusting when a big package arrives for him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 34
programme.desc: The circus has come to town and the Squirrels are excited, but it's a flea circus.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 35
programme.desc: One of the chickens is laying her eggs, and one of the eggs has sprouted legs!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: Duggee's nephew Dudley comes to stay, and causes puppy chaos in the clubhouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Squirrels are interested in a big cardboard box that has arrived for Duggee.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 38

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 39
programme.desc: It's a beautiful day, and the Squirrels are learning to make sand castles on the beach.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: Duggee decides it's time to teach the Squirrels to play football.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 41

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 42
programme.desc: Duggee is using his trusty binoculars to do some bird-watching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: Duggee introduces the squirrels to his friend Eugene, the leader of the Big Parade.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: Naughty Monkey causes chaos when he throws his banana skins around!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 45
programme.desc: Tag falls over and bumps his knee. Duggee has his First Aid Badge so he can help Tag.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Duggee has a pot of bubble mixture and he's blowing fantastic bubbles.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 47

programme.title: Booked: First Day In - EP 14
programme.desc: An elderly woman gets arrested for domestic battery after fighting with her sister. Meanwhile in Virginia Beach, a 19-year-old boy gets extradited from Miami after missing his court date.

programme.title: American Justice - EP 20
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1) - EP 1

programme.title: City Confidential - EP 13
programme.desc: A brutal double murder shocks Northern California's peace-loving and laid-back Marin County. With residents reeling, police chase an elusive killer through three counties.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S2) - EP 23
programme.desc: In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure it's a homicide and they spend nine years searching for clues.

programme.title: Women On Death Row - EP 6
programme.desc: Melissa Lucio was sentenced to death for the murder of her two-year-old daughter, Mariah, and in January 2022 she was given an official execution date of April 27, 2022.

programme.title: Taking The Stand - EP 5
programme.desc: Shayna Hubers takes the stand to defend herself after she brutally murdered her on-again, off-again boyfriend, Ryan Poston. She willingly takes the stand to prove her actions were in self-defense.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6) - EP 20

programme.title: First Blood (S1) - EP 6

programme.title: Fatal Vows (S6) - EP 9

programme.title: 60 Days In (S7) - EP 12

programme.title: My Strange Arrest - EP 6
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. Two senior citizens get locked up for trespassing while trapping stray cats; a man is arrested after pouring milk on his head.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest - EP 7
programme.desc: A suspect flees from a high-speed car chase while carrying her infant child. State troopers catch a man with a stolen utility pole strapped to the roof of his car.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Gabby Petito Story

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3) - EP 8

programme.title: Phrogging: Hider In My House - EP 9

programme.title: Secrets Of Our Cities S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: In Bondi, Greig Pickhaver travels to the iconic Australian beach suburb. Bondi has welcomed Jewish migrants ever since Australia's first Jewish free settler built the first house in Bondi in the 1830s.

programme.title: Art Works S3 - EP 12
programme.desc: We meet conductor and synesthete Jessica Cottis; Namila meets the "mother of contemporary African dance" Germaine Acogny before chatting with artist Nani Puspasari; plus a performance from slam poet Rania Ahmed.

programme.title: One Plus One - The Elders (2023) - EP 4
programme.desc: From Yarrawonga in Victoria's Yorta Yorta Country, Ian Hamm shares with Dan how his own story of being a 'stolen child' sparked his life-long determination to reshape how Government policies affect First Nations people.

programme.title: Project Wild S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Nature nerd, Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planet's amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time Ann explores the Kingdom of Tonga.

programme.title: Landline (2024) - EP 2
programme.desc: A look back at more of the best stories from Landline in 2024. Preparing animal industries for major disease threats, and saving the town vet clinic from closure.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2024
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazines 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the shows wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2024

programme.title: Meet The Press 2024
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: Cities Of Success - EP 3
programme.desc: The pandemic and the success of startup culture have sparked the emergence of new hubs for businesses outside of traditional power centers of New York, Chicago, Houston and San Francisco. These Cities of Success each have used unique characteristics - pop culture influence, clusters of great universities, friendly geography or forward-thinking local governments - to attract major companies and nurture an entrepreneurial community around them.

programme.title: The Cnbc Conversation
programme.desc: A show that lets the person talk for themselves and gives audiences a glimpse at the personality behind the public persona. Heads of State, titans of business and celebrated stars sit down for the CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: Meet The Press 2024
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBCs flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Capital Connection
programme.desc: Hosted by Dan Murphy at NASDAQ Dubai, "Capital Connection" gives you a reading on Asia's markets mid-day and sets you up for the Middle East and European trading day.

programme.title: Europe Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Steve Sedgwick, Karen Tso and Arabile Gumede, CNBCs flagship show leads you into and delivers the open of the European markets. Featuring leading business executives, financial strategists and fund managers, "Squawk Box" provides original points of view and instant analysis of the latest business and market news.

programme.title: Europe Street Signs
programme.desc: One hour into Europes equity session, "Street Signs" provides the street's view and a link to business stories trending online and on social. programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange
programme.desc: Broadcast from CNBC Global Headquarters in Englewood Cliffs, N.J., CNBCs "Worldwide Exchange" delivers essential, actionable information and analysis for anyone who wants to be part of the global business conversation. programme.title: Bloomberg Originals
programme.desc: Powerful stories, revealing conversations and animations to help make sense of the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Originals
programme.desc: Examining all things climate, ranging from the biggest environmental story of the moment and why it matters in a larger scale, to innovative solutions that can turn the tide.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the world's most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Posthuman S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: Posthuman
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the world of business and finance by harnessing the power of Bloomberg Businessweek reporters and editors.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin reveals the burgeoning role of India's private space firms and their recent advances. Leaders and innovators divulge how they are pushing the boundaries of space.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Join Haslinda Amin on a journey to the frontiers of innovation, uncovering the groundbreaking ideas and inspiring people shaping our future.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Japan is seeing a renaissance in its chip industry. Spearheaded by giants and startups alike, what lessons are there for the world as this digital transformation takes shape?

programme.title: Idea Generation
programme.desc: Ideas are the global currency of the 21st century. But how do you come up with, execute, and operationalise one? The answers are what separates successful creative influences from everyone else.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor & TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire, the future of Hollywood and what's next.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player & Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nike's Jordan Brand.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Instacart CEO Fidji Simo in her hometown in the South of France, and learns about her journey from a small fishing village to the C-Suite in Silicon Valley.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 3
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In Texas, a former preacher exploited the trust of his peers under a cloak of religious virtue. This is the intimate story of those whose lives were destroyed by his $38 million dollar Ponzi scheme.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: PFAS chemicals are used in thousands of products aimed at making life easier. But the chemicals are now almost everywhere, including in human blood, and are being linked to severe health problems.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canada's finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMP's Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Apose S1
programme.desc: APOSE: ANAK PODCAST SEJATI tells the story of a podcaster's work life both on air and behind the scenes. In this series, there is a star podcaster who will interview a number of sources who will be present at the office.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

Produced by CGTNs studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the countrys business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTNs English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on whats relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!

programme.title: Historical Drama "Dear Radiance" Eps. 48 (Final) (R)
programme.desc: Asked by Rinko about her relationship with Michinaga, Mahiro opens up about their past. Rinko is surprised to learn everything, but she entrusts Mahiro with a certain "wish". After that, Mahiro meets an unknown woman who gets interested in "The Tale of Genji" and hears unexpected opinions. As time goes by, Michinaga realizes that his own end is near and makes his final decision while witnessing the deaths of the courtiers who has supported the country with him and his beloved family.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: Drama 10 "The Classroom Across the Universe" Eps. 10 (Final) (R)
programme.desc: The story is set in a part-time high school in Shinjuku, Tokyo, where students of different ages and backgrounds, each with diverse circumstances, attend. Under the guidance of the mysterious science teacher Fujitake (Kubota Masataka), who was assigned to the school, they aim to present at an academic conference with an experiment to recreate a Mars crater in the classroom. However, many challenges, including personal obstacles, family troubles, and unbreakable relationships, stand in their way.

This is a family drama depicting 100 years of three generations who lived with this English radio program; Yasuko who was born on the same day as the radio broadcasting started, her child Rui, and grandchild Hinata. Listening to the radio, these three heroines find their own ways of living overcoming hardships.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 73
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her fathers opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japans fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.desc: In 1925, radio broadcasting was initiated in Japan and soon after, a program for English language learners began. This is a family drama depicting 100 years of three generations who lived with this English radio program; Yasuko who was born on the same day as the radio broadcasting started, her child Rui, and grandchild Hinata. Listening to the radio, these three heroines find their own ways of living overcoming hardships.

programme.title: ETV Special"Silence Under the Law:The Guilt of the Eugenic Protection Law,1948-2
programme.desc: The Supreme Court ruled in July that the Eugenic Protection Law is unconstitutional. Thirty-nine of approximately 25,000 victims have sued the government. Many of them still carry the wounds in their hearts. Why has society overlooked forced sterilization for half a century? The documentary explores the reasons behind the silence caused by the Eugenic Protection Law from both the victims and societys perspectives.

As Chi-ho and Cheung Wai become further involved, Szeto and Mei-ting team up to dismantle the powerful syndicate behind these crimes.

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1843
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 515
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption - EP 19
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Are You The One - EP 25
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1843
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden Bowl - EP 3
programme.desc: Three Man brothers each opened their own noodle store to compete with each other. Mother Wan (Nancy Sit) has no choice but to help them settle the dispute by using their family treasure to get the brothers to compete with the eventual goal of uniting them.

programme.title: Golden Bowl - EP 4
programme.desc: Three Man brothers each opened their own noodle store to compete with each other. Mother Wan (Nancy Sit) has no choice but to help them settle the dispute by using their family treasure to get the brothers to compete with the eventual goal of uniting them.

programme.title: Only For Love - EP 16
programme.desc: Hardworking financial reporter Zheng Shu Yi (Bai Lu) is determined to land a front-page story with Shi Yan (Dylan Wang) a successful young CEO that the whole city is talking about. She pulls all the stops, eventually gets through to him and even love blossoms.

programme.title: Choice Husband - EP 23
programme.desc: Shen Miao is the treasured daughter of the wealthiest merchant in Yangzhou City but is not the luckiest when it comes to marriage. Stay tuned to a twisted love tale she's involved between a talented scholar and rich glib.

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 74
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 17
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mothers pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 21
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNGs dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chungs International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 22
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNGs dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chungs International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 29
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 11
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 11
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 11
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-heis boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 27
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 25
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.
